i:doc.i:body:
VICTINA SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL
Victina is an Austin/Dallas based Information Systems Consulting Company. We specialize in working with both our employees and customers for maximum satisfaction.
LOCATION: Austin, TX
SKILLS:
-Experience in developing on-line transactions processing client/server applications using rapid developmentt techniques with PowerBuilder 5.0 in the MS Windows environment. -Experience with Noblenet RPC development. -Experience with Postalsoft development. -Experience developing applications using the evolutionary prototyping software development life cycle model. -Experience in deploying client/server applications in a network environment. -Experience designing Sybase databases. -Relevant and recent experience in successfully providing contract programming services. -Operating systems: Solaris and UNIX
Please email resumes to (victina01@aol.com)
Victina Systems International 3532 Bee Caves Road, Suite 202 Austin, Texas 78746 Fax: (512) 327-1651
VICTINA SYSTEMS INT'L
